definition[0]: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about
example[0]: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
example[1]: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
example[2]: I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
definition[1]: used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘him or her’
example[3]: If anyone phones, tell them I’ll be back later.
definition[2]: used to mean ‘those’. Many people think this use is incorrect
example[4]: I couldn’t understand all them long words.
